I guess this scene is frozen until Alloran gets back?

::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Yes. Find out the layout of the city, and what their
defences are like. If you can, get the number of Maximals currently
on the team, and as much info as you can about them."

He reaches equipment room 4, entering it. "This room should have
everything you'll need. Help yourself."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Vamprah:
>
> Vamprah follow them
>
> "Any special thing that you would like that I find out, Zardus?"
